text: Men ða leofestan, we geleornodon on godcundum gewritum þæt <æghwylces> monnes sawul, æfter þisse weorulde, scyl <gesecan> eft <dane> <lichaman> <and> <þissum> wordum ærest þus sprecaþ and cweð þæs synfullan monnes sawle, gihyrstu, earma senfulla lichoma?
Ic cyrre to ðe to ðan þæt ic ðe werge and þine ungeleafulnesse <ðe> gesecge.
Forhwon, earma lichoma, lufodesðu þone feond, ðæt wæs se diofol?
Forhwon lyfdest ðu þæm <ðe> þe <forlærde> þurh synnelustas?
And forhwon earma lichoma, noldest þu gelyfan in <þam> alysende Gode ælmihtigum, se for ðinum ðingum manigfeald wite þrowode?
God gefæsteXXXX<dages> <tosomne>, and æfter ðam fæstene he self wæs <rode> gefæstnod his fet and his hand <ge> næglum, and <ðurh> he us <wolde> of <hylle>.
